page.title: 17LIGHT INDUSTRY IN WETHERBY
page.content: There is a diversity of industry in Wetherby, both in size, scope and range. There are small specialised companies, often family owned employing <5 people. H Bell Machine Tools, a family firm founded in 1920 had just installed 2 computer robots which cut manufacturing times from hours to minutes. Wilson's had just made a lubrication system for an Indian steelworks. Larger firms who have been expanding since they started in business are for example:{Arville Textiles}(workforce approx. 150), specialists in using synthetic fibres for the manufacture of industrial cloth, uses include filters, fuel tanks and the forces (bullet-proof vests!);{Safepack (approx.150) who make cardboard packaging; &{Farnell}who make 'Hi-Tec' instruments for world wide markets.
